Package edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg

Class FormulaNode

java.lang.Object
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg.Node
edu.uky.cs.nil.sabre.hg.FormulaNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
CostSet, Countable, Serializable, Iterable<CostSet.Entry>
Direct Known Subclasses:
ArithmeticNode, ConstantNode, FluentNode, UtilityNode
public abstract class FormulaNode extends Node implements CostSet
An cost set node whose logical formula appears as a smaller part of some larger formula and which needs to notify the node representing that larger formula when its gains new values.
Author:
Stephen G. Ware
See Also:

    • FormulaNode

      protected FormulaNode(HeuristicGraph graph, Logical label)

      label - the logical formula this node represents

  • Method Details

    • setCost

      protected boolean setCost(Value value, double cost)
      Sets the cost of this node's logical formula having the given value. The value's cost will only be updated if the given cost is less than the current cost of that value.

      The FormulaNode class does not track values or costs; by default this method only notifies all nodes that represent formulas in which this node's formula appears as a smaller part and returns true. This method should be overridden by child classes to record values and their costs.

      Parameters:
      value - a value that the formula this node represents can now have
      cost - the cost of the formula this node represents having that value
      Returns:
      true if the cost of that value was updated, or false if this node's state did not change
